content.description: Informative header text in the Age Verification modal

custom-attributes.custom-attribute:
As you have age-restricted goods in your basket, we need to confirm that you are over 18.

Usually, this can be verified from your address details, but on this occasion, we have been unable to do so.

You can verify your age by entering either your UK driver’s license information or your passport details. (All nationality passports are accepted).

Please choose your preferred document from the drop-down menu below.
